#summary GUI MultiLine EditBox functions
<BR>
<BR>
=== SetGUIMultiLineEditBoxMaxTextLength(double gui_edit_box_id, double max_length) ===
----
Sets the maximum number of characters in a GUI multiline editbox.
====Parameters====
   * _gui_edit_box_id_ - The ID of the GUI multiline editbox.
   * _max_length_ - The max number of characters.
<BR>
<BR>
=== EnableGUIMultiLineEditBoxReadOnly(double gui_edit_box_id, double enable) ===
----
Enable or disable whether a GUI multiline editbox is read-only.
====Parameters====
   * _gui_edit_box_id_ - The ID of the GUI multiline editbox.
   * _enable_ - Whether to enable or disable read-only.
<BR>
<BR>
=== EnableGUIMultiLineEditBoxWordWrapping(double gui_edit_box_id, double enable) ===
----
Enable or disable word wrapping in a GUI multiline editbox.
====Parameters====
   * _gui_edit_box_id_ - The ID of the GUI multiline editbox.
   * _enable_ - Whether to enable or disable word wrapping.
<BR>
<BR>
=== ShowGUIMultiLineEditBoxVertScrollbarAlways(double gui_edit_box_id, double show_always) ===
----
Shows or hides the vertical scrollbar in a GUI multiline editbox.
====Parameters====
   * _gui_edit_box_id_ - The ID of the GUI multiline editbox.
   * _show_always_ - Whether to show the vertical scrollbar always or not.
<BR>
